name: default
description: Main content. Use to replace the input field element. (It is recommended to use "TFieldWrapper" instead.)

description.content: Required attributes to bind to the input element.

{
  id: '...', // unique id used for the input element.
  placeholder: '...', // String to use as plceholer. This should always be an empty string. This is is only used to check if state of placeholder visibility.
  aria-label: '...', // Label for accessibility.
  readonly: '...', //Boolean. Indicates readonly element.
  disabled: '...', //Boolean, Indicates disabled element.
}

scopes.name: classNames
scopes.description: Array of default class names used for the input element
